query: SrcProcParentImagePath endswith "\onenote.exe" AND ( SrcProcImagePath In Contains Anycase ("\AppData", "\Users\Public", "\ProgramData", "\Windows\Tasks", "\Windows\Temp", "\Windows\System32\Tasks") OR (SrcProcImagePath EndsWith "\explorer.exe" AND CmdLine In Contains Anycase (".hta", ".vb", ".wsh", ".js", ".ps", ".scr", ".pif", ".bat", ".cmd")) OR SrcProcName In Contains Anycase ("RUNDLL32.exe", "REGSVR32.exe", "bitsadmin.exe", "CertUtil.exe", "InstallUtil.exe", "schtasks.exe", "wmic.exe", "cscript.exe", "wscript.exe", "CMSTP.EXE", "Microsoft.Workflow.Compiler.exe", "RegAsm.exe", "RegSvcs.exe", "MSHTA.EXE", "Msxsl.exe", "IEExec.exe", "Cmd.Exe", "PowerShell.EXE", "HH.exe", "javaw.exe", "pcalua.exe", "curl.exe", "ScriptRunner.exe", "CertOC.exe", "WorkFolders.exe", "odbcconf.exe", "msiexec.exe", "msdt.exe"))
